page.title: 02LEISURE ACTIVITIES-Newtown
page.content: LEISURE ACTIVITIES OF SOME OF THE PEOPLE OF NEWTOWN, GT.YARMOUTH Three of us went into Newtown armed with prepared questionnaire sheets, and we interviewed some people who lived within the stated area. People reacted well when questioned, although some were more serious than others. For instance, when I questioned a local roadsweeper,he answered,"By the time I am off work at the weekend, I am skint!" This is a list to show how many, out of a sample of 25, use these popular nearby facilities: Stadium 2,Keep Fit 1,Bure Park 'pitch and putt' 4,Athletics Club 1,Caister Golf Club 3,Swimming Pool 2,Racecourse 1,Marina Leisure Centre 5.
